articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Team Trump haunted by its lack of credibility
articles.description: In a time of crisis, it may be tempting for many Americans to give their leaders the benefit of the doubt. Trump and Pompeo have made that impossible.
articles.content: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo appeared on CNN this morning, touting Donald Trump’s decision to target and kill Qassim Soleimani, commander of Iran’s Quds Force. The administration’s top diplomat seemed eager to assure the public that yesterday’s airstrikes, … [+4037 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: 'Very tense day' anticipated Saturday as official funeral for Soleimani is held near U.S. forces
articles.description: Richard Engel reports on the potential for an "explosive and dangerous" day on Saturday as the official funerals for Iran General Qassem Soleimani and Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis, the deputy of militias in Iraq, are held in close proximity to U.S. forces.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Sen. Kaine seeks congressional debate before any war with Iran
articles.description: Senator Tim Kaine (D-VA) joins Andrea Mitchell, questioning the president's decision to strike and kill Qasam Soleimani without congressional authorization...

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: de Blasio on potential Iran threats: Iran has 'scouted NYC targets' before
articles.description: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio speaks with Ali Velshi and Stephanie Ruhle about how the city is preparing for potential Iran threats, following a U.S. air strike that killed top general Qassem Soleimani.

articles.title: President Trump looking to cement and expand evangelical support
articles.description: Ahead of the 2020 election, President Trump is looking to cement -- and expand -- his support with evangelicals, a constituency that was key to his 2016 victory. Senior Fellow at the Ethics and Public Policy Center, Peter Wehner, and Rev. Jacqui Lewis, a

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: McGurk: We have to presume a 'state of war' with Iran
articles.description: Brett McGurk, former Special Presidential Envoy for the Global Coalition to Defeat ISIS, joins Andrea Mitchell, to discuss the latest developments following the Soleimani strike. He points to the deployment of the 82nd Airborne to the Middle East as an indica…
